renderpass.code:
#define TIME 0.25
#define SIZE 549

#define C  0
#define Cs 1
#define D  2
#define Ds 3
#define Ef  3
#define E  4
#define F  5
#define Fs 6
#define G  7
#define Gs 8
#define Af  8
#define A  9
#define As 10
#define Bf  10
#define B  11
#define NOTE(name, octave) name + (octave - 2) * 12

#define RANGE 48

int prelude[SIZE] = int[](
        NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(E, 4), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(C, 5), NOTE(E, 5), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(C, 5), NOTE(E, 5),
        NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(E, 4), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(C, 5), NOTE(E, 5), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(C, 5), NOTE(E, 5),
        NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(D, 4), NOTE(A, 4), NOTE(D, 5), NOTE(F, 5), NOTE(A, 4), NOTE(D, 5), NOTE(F, 5),
        NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(D, 4), NOTE(A, 4), NOTE(D, 5), NOTE(F, 5), NOTE(A, 4), NOTE(D, 5), NOTE(F, 5),
        NOTE(B, 3), NOTE(D, 4), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(D, 5), NOTE(F, 5), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(D, 5), NOTE(F, 5),
        NOTE(B, 3), NOTE(D, 4), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(D, 5), NOTE(F, 5), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(D, 5), NOTE(F, 5),
        NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(E, 4), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(C, 5), NOTE(E, 5), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(C, 5), NOTE(E, 5),
        NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(E, 4), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(C, 5), NOTE(E, 5), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(C, 5), NOTE(E, 5),
        
        NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(E, 4), NOTE(A, 4), NOTE(E, 5), NOTE(A, 5), NOTE(A, 4), NOTE(E, 5), NOTE(A, 5),
        NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(E, 4), NOTE(A, 4), NOTE(E, 5), NOTE(A, 5), NOTE(A, 4), NOTE(E, 5), NOTE(A, 5),
        NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(D, 4), NOTE(Fs, 4), NOTE(A, 4), NOTE(D, 5), NOTE(Fs, 4), NOTE(A, 4), NOTE(D, 5),
        NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(D, 4), NOTE(Fs, 4), NOTE(A, 4), NOTE(D, 5), NOTE(Fs, 4), NOTE(A, 4), NOTE(D, 5),
        NOTE(B, 3), NOTE(D, 4), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(D, 5), NOTE(G, 5), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(D, 5), NOTE(G, 5),
        NOTE(B, 3), NOTE(D, 4), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(D, 5), NOTE(G, 5), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(D, 5), NOTE(G, 5),
        NOTE(B, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(E, 4), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(C, 5), NOTE(E, 4), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(C, 5),
        NOTE(B, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(E, 4), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(C, 5), NOTE(E, 4), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(C, 5),
        NOTE(A, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(E, 4), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(C, 5), NOTE(E, 4), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(C, 5),
        NOTE(A, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(E, 4), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(C, 5), NOTE(E, 4), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(C, 5),
        NOTE(D, 3), NOTE(A, 3), NOTE(D, 4), NOTE(Fs, 4), NOTE(C, 5), NOTE(D, 4), NOTE(Fs, 4), NOTE(C, 5),
        NOTE(D, 3), NOTE(A, 3), NOTE(D, 4), NOTE(Fs, 4), NOTE(C, 5), NOTE(D, 4), NOTE(Fs, 4), NOTE(C, 5),
        
        NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(B, 3), NOTE(D, 4), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(B, 4), NOTE(D, 4), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(B, 4),
        NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(B, 3), NOTE(D, 4), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(B, 4), NOTE(D, 4), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(B, 4),
        NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(Bf, 3), NOTE(E, 4), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(Cs, 5), NOTE(E, 4), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(Cs, 5),
        NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(Bf, 3), NOTE(E, 4), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(Cs, 5), NOTE(E, 4), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(Cs, 5),
        NOTE(F, 3), NOTE(A, 3), NOTE(D, 4), NOTE(A, 4), NOTE(D, 5), NOTE(D, 4), NOTE(A, 4), NOTE(D, 5),
        NOTE(F, 3), NOTE(A, 3), NOTE(D, 4), NOTE(A, 4), NOTE(D, 5), NOTE(D, 4), NOTE(A, 4), NOTE(D, 5),
        NOTE(F, 3), NOTE(Af, 3), NOTE(D, 4), NOTE(F, 4), NOTE(B, 4), NOTE(D, 4), NOTE(F, 4), NOTE(B, 4),
        NOTE(F, 3), NOTE(Af, 3), NOTE(D, 4), NOTE(F, 4), NOTE(B, 4), NOTE(D, 4), NOTE(F, 4), NOTE(B, 4),
        NOTE(E, 3), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(C, 5), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(C, 5),
        NOTE(E, 3), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(C, 5), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(C, 5),
        NOTE(E, 3), NOTE(F, 3), NOTE(A, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(F, 4), NOTE(A, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(F, 4),
        NOTE(E, 3), NOTE(F, 3), NOTE(A, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(F, 4), NOTE(A, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(F, 4),
        NOTE(D, 3), NOTE(F, 3), NOTE(A, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(F, 4), NOTE(A, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(F, 4),
        NOTE(D, 3), NOTE(F, 3), NOTE(A, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(F, 4), NOTE(A, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(F, 4),
        NOTE(G, 2), NOTE(D, 3), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(B, 3), NOTE(F, 4), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(B, 3), NOTE(F, 4),
        NOTE(G, 2), NOTE(D, 3), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(B, 3), NOTE(F, 4), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(B, 3), NOTE(F, 4),
        
        NOTE(C, 3), NOTE(E, 3), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(E, 4), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(E, 4),
        NOTE(C, 3), NOTE(E, 3), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(E, 4), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(E, 4),
        NOTE(C, 3), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(Bf, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(E, 4), NOTE(Bf, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(E, 4),
        NOTE(C, 3), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(Bf, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(E, 4), NOTE(Bf, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(E, 4),
        NOTE(F, 2), NOTE(F, 3), NOTE(A, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(E, 4), NOTE(A, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(E, 4),
        NOTE(F, 2), NOTE(F, 3), NOTE(A, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(E, 4), NOTE(A, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(E, 4),
        NOTE(Fs, 2), NOTE(C, 3), NOTE(A, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(Ef, 4), NOTE(A, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(Ef, 4),
        NOTE(Fs, 2), NOTE(C, 3), NOTE(A, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(Ef, 4), NOTE(A, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(Ef, 4),
        NOTE(Af, 2), NOTE(F, 3), NOTE(B, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(D, 4), NOTE(B, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(D, 4),
        NOTE(Af, 2), NOTE(F, 3), NOTE(B, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(D, 4), NOTE(B, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(D, 4),
        
        NOTE(G, 2), NOTE(F, 3), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(B, 3), NOTE(D, 4), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(B, 3), NOTE(D, 4),
        NOTE(G, 2), NOTE(F, 3), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(B, 3), NOTE(D, 4), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(B, 3), NOTE(D, 4),
        NOTE(G, 2), NOTE(E, 3), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(E, 4), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(E, 4),
        NOTE(G, 2), NOTE(E, 3), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(E, 4), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(E, 4),
        NOTE(G, 2), NOTE(D, 3), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(F, 4), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(F, 4),
        NOTE(G, 2), NOTE(D, 3), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(F, 4), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(F, 4),
        NOTE(G, 2), NOTE(D, 3), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(B, 3), NOTE(F, 4), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(B, 3), NOTE(F, 4),
        NOTE(G, 2), NOTE(D, 3), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(B, 3), NOTE(F, 4), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(B, 3), NOTE(F, 4),
        NOTE(G, 2), NOTE(Ef, 3), NOTE(A, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(Fs, 4), NOTE(A, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(Fs, 4),
        NOTE(G, 2), NOTE(Ef, 3), NOTE(A, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(Fs, 4), NOTE(A, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(Fs, 4),
        NOTE(G, 2), NOTE(E, 3), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(G, 4),
        NOTE(G, 2), NOTE(E, 3), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(G, 4),
        NOTE(G, 2), NOTE(D, 3), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(F, 4), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(F, 4),
        NOTE(G, 2), NOTE(D, 3), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(F, 4), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(F, 4),
        NOTE(G, 2), NOTE(D, 3), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(B, 3), NOTE(F, 4), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(B, 3), NOTE(F, 4),
        NOTE(G, 2), NOTE(D, 3), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(B, 3), NOTE(F, 4), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(B, 3), NOTE(F, 4),
        NOTE(C, 2), NOTE(C, 3), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(Bf, 3), NOTE(E, 4), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(Bf, 3), NOTE(E, 4),
        NOTE(C, 2), NOTE(C, 3), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(Bf, 3), NOTE(E, 4), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(Bf, 3), NOTE(E, 4),
        NOTE(C, 2), NOTE(C, 3), NOTE(F, 3), NOTE(A, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(F, 4), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(A, 3),
        NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(A, 3), NOTE(F, 3), NOTE(A, 3), NOTE(F, 3), NOTE(D, 3), NOTE(F, 3), NOTE(D, 3),
        NOTE(C, 2), NOTE(B, 2), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(B, 4), NOTE(D, 5), NOTE(F, 5), NOTE(D, 5), NOTE(B, 4),
        NOTE(D, 5), NOTE(B, 4), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(B, 4), NOTE(D, 4), NOTE(F, 4), NOTE(E, 4), NOTE(D, 4),
        NOTE(C, 2), NOTE(C, 3), NOTE(E, 4), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(C, 5)  
);

vec2 changeCoordinates(vec2 xy) {
    return xy / iResolution.xy;
}

#define X_SIZE 16.
void mainImage( out vec4 fragColor, in vec2 fragCoord ) {
    vec2 uv = changeCoordinates(fragCoord);
    int index = int(floor(iTime * 4.));
    for (float i = 0.; i < X_SIZE; i++) {
        int currentNote = prelude[index + int(i)];
        if (i/X_SIZE <= uv.x && uv.x <= (i + 1.)/X_SIZE) {
            if (float(currentNote)/float(RANGE) <= uv.y && uv.y <= float((currentNote+1))/float(RANGE)) {
                fragColor = vec4(0.000,0.000,0.000,1.0);
            } else {
                fragColor = vec4(1.000,1.000,1.000,1.0);
            }
        }
    }
}
renderpass.name: Image

renderpass.code:
#define TAU 6.28318
#define POW_1_12TH 1.059463094

vec2 instrument(float t, float f) {   
    float attack = t < 0.025 ? t / 0.025 : 1.;
    float v = 0.5 * sin(TAU * f * t) * exp(-1.7 * t);
    v += 0.1 * sin(TAU * f * t) * exp(-2. * t);
    v += 0.05 * sin(TAU * f * t) * exp(-4. * t);
    
    return vec2(v * attack) * 0.2;
}


float notefreq(float n) {
    return 440. * pow(POW_1_12TH, n);
}

#define C  0.0
#define Cs 1.0
#define D  2.0
#define Ds 3.0
#define Ef  3.0
#define E  4.0
#define F  5.0
#define Fs 6.0
#define G  7.0
#define Gs 8.0
#define Af  8.0
#define A  9.0
#define As 10.0
#define Bf  10.0
#define B  11.0
#define NOTE(name, octave) notefreq( (name - 9.) + (float(octave) - 4.) * 12. )

#define SIZE 549
vec2 mainSound(in int samp, float t) {
    float prelude[SIZE] = float[](
        NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(E, 4), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(C, 5), NOTE(E, 5), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(C, 5), NOTE(E, 5),
        NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(E, 4), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(C, 5), NOTE(E, 5), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(C, 5), NOTE(E, 5),
        NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(D, 4), NOTE(A, 4), NOTE(D, 5), NOTE(F, 5), NOTE(A, 4), NOTE(D, 5), NOTE(F, 5),
        NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(D, 4), NOTE(A, 4), NOTE(D, 5), NOTE(F, 5), NOTE(A, 4), NOTE(D, 5), NOTE(F, 5),
        NOTE(B, 3), NOTE(D, 4), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(D, 5), NOTE(F, 5), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(D, 5), NOTE(F, 5),
        NOTE(B, 3), NOTE(D, 4), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(D, 5), NOTE(F, 5), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(D, 5), NOTE(F, 5),
        NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(E, 4), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(C, 5), NOTE(E, 5), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(C, 5), NOTE(E, 5),
        NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(E, 4), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(C, 5), NOTE(E, 5), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(C, 5), NOTE(E, 5),
        
        NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(E, 4), NOTE(A, 4), NOTE(E, 5), NOTE(A, 5), NOTE(A, 4), NOTE(E, 5), NOTE(A, 5),
        NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(E, 4), NOTE(A, 4), NOTE(E, 5), NOTE(A, 5), NOTE(A, 4), NOTE(E, 5), NOTE(A, 5),
        NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(D, 4), NOTE(Fs, 4), NOTE(A, 4), NOTE(D, 5), NOTE(Fs, 4), NOTE(A, 4), NOTE(D, 5),
        NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(D, 4), NOTE(Fs, 4), NOTE(A, 4), NOTE(D, 5), NOTE(Fs, 4), NOTE(A, 4), NOTE(D, 5),
        NOTE(B, 3), NOTE(D, 4), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(D, 5), NOTE(G, 5), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(D, 5), NOTE(G, 5),
        NOTE(B, 3), NOTE(D, 4), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(D, 5), NOTE(G, 5), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(D, 5), NOTE(G, 5),
        NOTE(B, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(E, 4), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(C, 5), NOTE(E, 4), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(C, 5),
        NOTE(B, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(E, 4), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(C, 5), NOTE(E, 4), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(C, 5),
        NOTE(A, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(E, 4), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(C, 5), NOTE(E, 4), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(C, 5),
        NOTE(A, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(E, 4), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(C, 5), NOTE(E, 4), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(C, 5),
        NOTE(D, 3), NOTE(A, 3), NOTE(D, 4), NOTE(Fs, 4), NOTE(C, 5), NOTE(D, 4), NOTE(Fs, 4), NOTE(C, 5),
        NOTE(D, 3), NOTE(A, 3), NOTE(D, 4), NOTE(Fs, 4), NOTE(C, 5), NOTE(D, 4), NOTE(Fs, 4), NOTE(C, 5),
        
        NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(B, 3), NOTE(D, 4), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(B, 4), NOTE(D, 4), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(B, 4),
        NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(B, 3), NOTE(D, 4), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(B, 4), NOTE(D, 4), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(B, 4),
        NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(Bf, 3), NOTE(E, 4), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(Cs, 5), NOTE(E, 4), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(Cs, 5),
        NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(Bf, 3), NOTE(E, 4), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(Cs, 5), NOTE(E, 4), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(Cs, 5),
        NOTE(F, 3), NOTE(A, 3), NOTE(D, 4), NOTE(A, 4), NOTE(D, 5), NOTE(D, 4), NOTE(A, 4), NOTE(D, 5),
        NOTE(F, 3), NOTE(A, 3), NOTE(D, 4), NOTE(A, 4), NOTE(D, 5), NOTE(D, 4), NOTE(A, 4), NOTE(D, 5),
        NOTE(F, 3), NOTE(Af, 3), NOTE(D, 4), NOTE(F, 4), NOTE(B, 4), NOTE(D, 4), NOTE(F, 4), NOTE(B, 4),
        NOTE(F, 3), NOTE(Af, 3), NOTE(D, 4), NOTE(F, 4), NOTE(B, 4), NOTE(D, 4), NOTE(F, 4), NOTE(B, 4),
        NOTE(E, 3), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(C, 5), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(C, 5),
        NOTE(E, 3), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(C, 5), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(C, 5),
        NOTE(E, 3), NOTE(F, 3), NOTE(A, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(F, 4), NOTE(A, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(F, 4),
        NOTE(E, 3), NOTE(F, 3), NOTE(A, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(F, 4), NOTE(A, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(F, 4),
        NOTE(D, 3), NOTE(F, 3), NOTE(A, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(F, 4), NOTE(A, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(F, 4),
        NOTE(D, 3), NOTE(F, 3), NOTE(A, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(F, 4), NOTE(A, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(F, 4),
        NOTE(G, 2), NOTE(D, 3), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(B, 3), NOTE(F, 4), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(B, 3), NOTE(F, 4),
        NOTE(G, 2), NOTE(D, 3), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(B, 3), NOTE(F, 4), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(B, 3), NOTE(F, 4),
        
        NOTE(C, 3), NOTE(E, 3), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(E, 4), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(E, 4),
        NOTE(C, 3), NOTE(E, 3), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(E, 4), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(E, 4),
        NOTE(C, 3), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(Bf, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(E, 4), NOTE(Bf, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(E, 4),
        NOTE(C, 3), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(Bf, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(E, 4), NOTE(Bf, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(E, 4),
        NOTE(F, 2), NOTE(F, 3), NOTE(A, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(E, 4), NOTE(A, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(E, 4),
        NOTE(F, 2), NOTE(F, 3), NOTE(A, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(E, 4), NOTE(A, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(E, 4),
        NOTE(Fs, 2), NOTE(C, 3), NOTE(A, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(Ef, 4), NOTE(A, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(Ef, 4),
        NOTE(Fs, 2), NOTE(C, 3), NOTE(A, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(Ef, 4), NOTE(A, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(Ef, 4),
        NOTE(Af, 2), NOTE(F, 3), NOTE(B, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(D, 4), NOTE(B, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(D, 4),
        NOTE(Af, 2), NOTE(F, 3), NOTE(B, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(D, 4), NOTE(B, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(D, 4),
        
        NOTE(G, 2), NOTE(F, 3), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(B, 3), NOTE(D, 4), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(B, 3), NOTE(D, 4),
        NOTE(G, 2), NOTE(F, 3), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(B, 3), NOTE(D, 4), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(B, 3), NOTE(D, 4),
        NOTE(G, 2), NOTE(E, 3), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(E, 4), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(E, 4),
        NOTE(G, 2), NOTE(E, 3), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(E, 4), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(E, 4),
        NOTE(G, 2), NOTE(D, 3), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(F, 4), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(F, 4),
        NOTE(G, 2), NOTE(D, 3), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(F, 4), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(F, 4),
        NOTE(G, 2), NOTE(D, 3), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(B, 3), NOTE(F, 4), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(B, 3), NOTE(F, 4),
        NOTE(G, 2), NOTE(D, 3), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(B, 3), NOTE(F, 4), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(B, 3), NOTE(F, 4),
        NOTE(G, 2), NOTE(Ef, 3), NOTE(A, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(Fs, 4), NOTE(A, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(Fs, 4),
        NOTE(G, 2), NOTE(Ef, 3), NOTE(A, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(Fs, 4), NOTE(A, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(Fs, 4),
        NOTE(G, 2), NOTE(E, 3), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(G, 4),
        NOTE(G, 2), NOTE(E, 3), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(G, 4),
        NOTE(G, 2), NOTE(D, 3), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(F, 4), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(F, 4),
        NOTE(G, 2), NOTE(D, 3), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(F, 4), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(F, 4),
        NOTE(G, 2), NOTE(D, 3), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(B, 3), NOTE(F, 4), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(B, 3), NOTE(F, 4),
        NOTE(G, 2), NOTE(D, 3), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(B, 3), NOTE(F, 4), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(B, 3), NOTE(F, 4),
        NOTE(C, 2), NOTE(C, 3), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(Bf, 3), NOTE(E, 4), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(Bf, 3), NOTE(E, 4),
        NOTE(C, 2), NOTE(C, 3), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(Bf, 3), NOTE(E, 4), NOTE(G, 3), NOTE(Bf, 3), NOTE(E, 4),
        NOTE(C, 2), NOTE(C, 3), NOTE(F, 3), NOTE(A, 3), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(F, 4), NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(A, 3),
        NOTE(C, 4), NOTE(A, 3), NOTE(F, 3), NOTE(A, 3), NOTE(F, 3), NOTE(D, 3), NOTE(F, 3), NOTE(D, 3),
        NOTE(C, 2), NOTE(B, 2), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(B, 4), NOTE(D, 5), NOTE(F, 5), NOTE(D, 5), NOTE(B, 4),
        NOTE(D, 5), NOTE(B, 4), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(B, 4), NOTE(D, 4), NOTE(F, 4), NOTE(E, 4), NOTE(D, 4),
        NOTE(C, 2), NOTE(C, 3), NOTE(E, 4), NOTE(G, 4), NOTE(C, 5) 
    );
    
    vec2 v = vec2(0.);
    
    for (int i = 0; i < SIZE; i++) {
        float st = float(i) * 0.25;
        if (t > st) {
            v += instrument(t - st, prelude[i]);
        }
    }
   
    return v;
}
renderpass.name: Sound
